home.heroDescription: Based in Sousse-Tunisia Passionate about AI and modern technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: 3rd year Software Engineering student at EPI Digital School, I am passionate about application development and artificial intelligence technologies. My journey has allowed me to acquire solid mastery of Full Stack environments (Angular, Spring Boot, React, Node.js) as well as AI and data science tools (Python, Rasa, PyTorch, Pandas).
about.description2: Curious, rigorous, and creative, I enjoy taking on technical challenges and working on innovative projects combining web, mobile development, and artificial intelligence. My goal is to design efficient and useful solutions while continuing to evolve in a stimulating and collaborative environment.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover my achievements and development experiences

workwave.title: WorkWave Platform
workwave.description: Web platform for freelancers and companies (matching, project management, profiles).

medical.title: Medical Appointment Chatbot
medical.description: Medical pre-diagnosis system with AI chatbot (Rasa) and appointment booking.

eniso.title: Site ENISO
eniso.description: Showcase website for ENISO, presenting activities and clubs.

data.title: Data Analysis Project
data.description: Data analysis with visualization and insight extraction.

appmobile.title: Medical Mobile Application
appmobile.description: Android mobile application for medical consultations developed with Kotlin.

ecommerce.title: Casaques E-Commerce Mobile App
ecommerce.description: Mobile e-commerce application for selling traditional casaques (Tunisian clothing) developed with Flutter. Offers a smooth user experience for browsing collections, searching products, and making purchases. Integrated with Firebase for user authentication and product data management.

smart-ecommerce.title: Intelligent E-commerce Platform with AI(chatbot and a virtual clothing try-on system )
smart-ecommerce.description: Design and development of a complete e-commerce platform integrating a multilingual AI chatbot managing the entire website workflow and a virtual clothing try-on system (VITON-HD, OpenPose, PyTorch). Implementation of a microservices architecture (Spring Boot, Flask, Angular) with secure REST API (JWT), product catalog management, cart, orders and payments (PayPal, Stripe, Orange Money). Development of a responsive and modern interface (Angular 17, TypeScript, SCSS).
